message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. It's worth more than $80 to us, but I understand its value may differ for you. Let's start with an offer of $95. I hope we can come to a fair agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $75 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. I would like to counter your offer with a price of $85 for the product. I believe this reflects its true value and I hope it aligns better with your budget.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my counteroffer to $80 for the product.
